## Public Member Functions

### getAnalysisUsage() {#a9d02eb24e13645d5e8d4b5108a2b1933}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;IfConversion.cpp&#125;::IfConverter::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp;) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - This function should be overriden by passes that need analysis information to do their job.

If a pass specifies that it uses a particular analysis result to this function, it can then use the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;AnalysisType&gt;()</a> function, below.

<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### AnalyzeBlock() {#a95b32fd16fd12629e3b3099555f3509d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void IfConverter::AnalyzeBlock (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, std::vector&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; IfcvtToken &gt; &gt; &amp; Tokens)</>}>
Analyze the structure of the sub-CFG starting from the specified block.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> its successors and whether it looks like an if-conversion candidate.

### CountDuplicatedInstructions() {#a568ca69029c4c61724fcc77c327487c3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IfConverter::CountDuplicatedInstructions (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; TIB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; FIB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; TIE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; FIE, unsigned &amp; Dups1, unsigned &amp; Dups2, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; TBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; FBB, bool SkipUnconditionalBranches) const</>}>
Count duplicated instructions and move the iterators to show where they are.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="TIB">True Iterator Begin</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="FIB">False Iterator Begin These two iterators initially point to the first instruction of the two blocks, and finally point to the first non-shared instruction.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="TIE">True Iterator End</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="FIE">False Iterator End These two iterators initially point to End() for the two <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/basicblocksections-cpp/#a6b480a971048f2d9cc342c18046d7774">blocks()</a> and finally point to the first shared instruction in the tail. Upon return &#91;TIB, TIE), and &#91;FIB, FIE) mark the un-duplicated portions of two blocks.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Dups1">count of duplicated instructions at the beginning of the 2 blocks.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Dups2">count of duplicated instructions at the end of the 2 blocks.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="SkipUnconditionalBranches">if true, Don&#39;t make sure that unconditional branches at the end of the blocks are the same. True is passed when the blocks are analyzable to allow for fallthrough to be handled.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Returns">
false if the shared portion prevents if conversion.
</SectionUser>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/ifconversion-cpp/#l00231">231</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/ifconversion-cpp">IfConversion.cpp</a>.

### IfConvertDiamondCommon() {#afec662f80c0ed6e21dab78eff047af85}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool IfConverter::IfConvertDiamondCommon (BBInfo &amp; BBI, BBInfo &amp; TrueBBI, BBInfo &amp; FalseBBI, unsigned NumDups1, unsigned NumDups2, bool TClobbersPred, bool FClobbersPred, bool RemoveBranch, bool MergeAddEdges)</>}>
Common code shared between diamond conversions.

<code>BBI</code>, <code>TrueBBI</code>, and <code>FalseBBI</code> form the diamond shape. <code>NumDups1</code> - number of shared instructions at the beginning of <code>TrueBBI</code> and FalseBBI <code>NumDups2</code> - number of shared instructions at the end of <code>TrueBBI</code> and <code>FalseBBI</code> <code>RemoveBranch</code> - Remove the common branch of the two blocks before predicating. Only false for unanalyzable fallthrough cases. The caller will replace the branch if necessary. <code>MergeAddEdges</code> - Add successor edges when merging blocks. Only false for unanalyzable fallthrough

### MergeBlocks() {#a45b84a44c12b1b02cc543dd541563618}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void IfConverter::MergeBlocks (BBInfo &amp; ToBBI, BBInfo &amp; FromBBI, bool AddEdges=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>)</>}>
Move all instructions from FromBB to the end of ToBB.

This will leave FromBB as an empty block, so remove all of its successor edges and move it to the end of the function. If AddEdges is true, i.e., when FromBBI&#39;s branch is being moved, add those successor edges to ToBBI and remove the old edge from ToBBI to FromBBI.

### ScanInstructions() {#afc87e2d645f4fa128675bb068e883f8a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void IfConverter::ScanInstructions (BBInfo &amp; BBI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; Begin, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp; End, bool BranchUnpredicable=false) const</>}>
ScanInstructions - Scan all the instructions in the block to determine if the block is predicable.

In most cases, that means all the instructions in the block are isPredicable(). Also checks if the block contains any instruction which can clobber a predicate (e.g. condition code register). If so, the block is not predicable unless it&#39;s the last instruction.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/ifconversion-cpp/#l00244">244</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/ifconversion-cpp">IfConversion.cpp</a>.

ValidForkedDiamond - Returns true if the &#39;true&#39; and &#39;false&#39; blocks (along with their common predecessor) form a diamond if a common tail block is extracted.

### ValidTriangle() {#aeee23784568fa2afceb3f40191204d37}

Returns true if the &#39;true&#39; and &#39;false&#39; blocks (along with their common predecessor) forms a valid triangle shape for ifcvt.

If &#39;FalseBranch&#39; is true, it checks if &#39;true&#39; block&#39;s false branch branches to the &#39;false&#39; block rather than the other way around. It also returns the number of instructions that the ifcvt would need to duplicate if performed in &#39;Dups&#39;.
